column2: After playing a compilation of video footage of Ajahn Chah from the BBS documentaries, Ajahn Pasanno reads from [Stillness Flowing](), the newly published biography of Ajahn Chah. He focuses on the chapter “[Out of Compassion](Stillness Flowing p. 581),” which describes Ajahn Chah's teachings to the lay community.
